data.text: @midnightoilband Hi! My friend Jacob Delbridge was supposed to celebrate his 21st birthday at your show in Rutherglen. He was really hoping you guys would be able to sing him happy birthday. Would it be possible in any way to get a birthday message from you guys?
@midnightoilband I hope you feel better soon Rob!
@midnightoilband By the way the new music is absolutely gorgeous beautiful amazing I could go on for ever but knowing I won’t get to see Bones again is sad 😞
@markc01 @midnightoilband The guy tested positive for COVID and that your response lol as if Rob’s work hasn’t given you any pleasure?
@midnightoilband Oh man I’m sending positive vibes     (((((((((((((((((((((()))))))))))))))))))))) please feel better soon!
@midnightoilband Rob needs LEMON JUICE, dissolve that bug in his throat, LIME works too, Get that squeeze shit from woollies and get into it, Metal Detox, Best advice I have being a broncho myself.
@midnightoilband @gail_unco23 That’s a bummer maybe ask def leppards drummer Rick Allen if he’ll give you A hand 🤔😬
@midnightoilband 🙏💜🙏💜🙏💜🙏. Prayers for Rob’s complete and quick recovery ❤️‍🩹 For everyone involved, stay safe. ☮️🎶🙏💜

@midnightoilband I will bring chicken soup and Panadol to literally whichever part of Victoria Rob currently occupies (not in a creepy way and at a COVID-safe distance) if you promise to play Gadigal Land at the Rutherglen gig 🙏
